arts.ttl: Rabiot ahead of Udinese match: “We are Milan and we must win”
arts.sum: Adrien Rabiot, AC Milan midfielder, starting for the second game in a row, spoke to Sky Sport 24 before tonight’s match against Udinese. His words. You started strong… "I had a good week and a good match. I’m not at 100% yet because before Bologna I hadn’t played for a month. I still need to […]

arts.ttl: AC Milan’s official lineup vs Udinese | Serie A matchday 4
arts.sum: AC Milan are set to face Udinese at the Blueenergy stadium. The fixture is an important one for Allegri's men to prove themselves. The official lineup of the Rossoneri has been revealed: 3-5-2: Terracciano; Tomori, Gabbia, Pavlovic; Saelemaekers, Fofana, Modric, Rabiot, Estupinan; Gimenez, Pulisic.

arts.ttl: A tough test awaits AC Milan against Udinese
arts.sum: At 20:45 Milan will close Saturday’s Serie A program, ahead of the games on Sunday and Monday. The Rossoneri will face Udinese. The hosts started strong, collecting 7 points in the first three matches with two wins and one draw. Milan, after the defeat against Cremonese, secured six important points by beating Lecce and Bologna. […]

arts.ttl: Udinese midfielder Atta looking forward to direct battle with Milan star Modric
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher There may well be a queue of players trying to get Luka Modric’s shirt after Udinese-Milan, and Arthur Atta will be in it. Atta joined Udinese in the summer window and he has arguably been their stand-out player so far after three games. He leads Serie A for most successful dribbles (10) with Udinese third […] The post Udinese midfielder Atta looking forward to direct battle with Milan star Modric appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Seven goals in the last two trips: All the key stats ahead of Udinese vs. Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Not many expected Udinese against AC Milan to be fourth versus fifth, but that is the state of play heading into Saturday’s meeting. Milan have played Udinese 107 times across their history in competitive fixtures, with a record of 47 wins, 37 draws and 23 defeats.
